languages.text:
Until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} cannot die.
Until the start of their next turn, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} suffered by the Vanguard is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Авангард{/g} не может погибнуть до конца своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
До начала следующего хода авангарда весь получаемый им {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} уменьшается на {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

traits.locale_text:
Until the end of their next turn, the Vanguard cannot die.
Until the start of their next turn, all damage suffered by the Vanguard is reduced by -<u>(TGH bonus)</u>.

traits.locale_text:
Авангард не может погибнуть до конца своего следующего хода.
До начала следующего хода авангарда весь получаемый им урон уменьшается на <u>бонус ВЫН</u>.

Авангард не может погибнуть до конца своего следующего хода.
До начала следующего хода авангарда весь получаемый им урон уменьшается на <u>бонус ВЫН</u>.

languages.text:
直到下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束之前，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}不会死亡。
此外，先锋受到的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会降低{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}点。
languages.original_text:
Until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} cannot die.
Until the start of their next turn, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} suffered by the Vanguard is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

traits.locale_text:
直到下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束之前，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}不会死亡。
此外，先锋受到的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会降低{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}点。

languages.text:
Hasta el final de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} no puede morir.
Hasta el comienzo de su próximo turno, todo el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que sufra el vanguardia se reduce en −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.
languages.original_text:
Until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} cannot die.
Until the start of their next turn, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} suffered by the Vanguard is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

traits.locale_text:
Hasta el final de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} no puede morir.
Hasta el comienzo de su próximo turno, todo el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que sufra el vanguardia se reduce en −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

languages.text:
Die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} kann bis zum Ende ihres nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} nicht sterben.
Bis zum Beginn ihres nächsten Zuges wird der von der Vorhut erlittener {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} um −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} reduziert.
languages.original_text:
Until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} cannot die.
Until the start of their next turn, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} suffered by the Vanguard is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

traits.locale_text:
Die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} kann bis zum Ende ihres nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} nicht sterben.
Bis zum Beginn ihres nächsten Zugs werden alle von der Vorhut erlittenen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schäden{/g} um −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} reduziert.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleur{/g} ne peut pas mourir. Jusqu'au début du tour suivant du patrouilleur, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} qu'il subit sont réduits de −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.
languages.original_text:
Until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} cannot die.
Until the start of their next turn, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} suffered by the Vanguard is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

traits.locale_text:
Jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Patrouilleur, celui-ci ne peut pas mourir.
Jusqu'au début du tour suivant du Patrouilleur, tous les dégâts qu'il subit sont réduits de -<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g}</u>.

languages.text:
次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}は死亡しない。
次のターン開始まで、ヴァンガードのすべての被{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が−{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}減少する。
languages.original_text:
Until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} cannot die.
Until the start of their next turn, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} suffered by the Vanguard is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

traits.locale_text:
次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、ヴァンガードは死亡しない。
次のターン開始まで、ヴァンガードのすべての被ダメージが-<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>減少する。
